from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql import Row
import datetime
import ast
import re
import pandas

account_name = "chiransubdl"
container_name = "chiransubfs"

order_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/orders.csv")
order_items_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_items.csv")
order_payments_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_payments.csv")
product_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/products.csv")
delivery_service_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/delivery_services.csv")
supplier_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/suppliers.csv")

order_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_raw_path)
order_df.createOrReplaceTempView("order")

order_items_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_items_raw_path)
order_items_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderitems")

order_payments_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_payments_raw_path)
order_payments_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderpayments")

products_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(product_raw_path)
products_df.createOrReplaceTempView("product")

delivery_services_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(delivery_service_raw_path)
delivery_services_df.createOrReplaceTempView("deliveryservices")

supplier_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(supplier_raw_path)
supplier_df.createOrReplaceTempView("supplier")

transformDate = udf(lambda z: reformat_date(z))

order_items_df = order_items_df\
.join(order_df.select("order_id","customer_id","order_approved_at","order_purchase_timestamp","order_delivered_carrier_date","order_delivered_customer_date","order_estimated_delivery_date","delivery_service_id"), on="order_id",how="left")\
.withColumn("order_approved_at", transformDate("order_approved_at"))\
.withColumn("order_delivered_carrier_date", transformDate("order_delivered_carrier_date"))\
.withColumn("order_delivered_customer_date", transformDate("order_delivered_customer_date"))\
.withColumn("order_estimated_delivery_date", transformDate("order_estimated_delivery_date"))\
.withColumn("order_purchase_timestamp", transformDate("order_purchase_timestamp"))\
.withColumn("shipping_limit_date", transformDate("shipping_limit_date"))\
.join(order_payments_df.select("order_id","payment_sequential","payment_installments","payment_value"), on ="order_id",how="left")\
.join(products_df.select(col("product_id"),col("unit_price").alias("product_unit_price"),col("product_quantity_on_hand"), col("product_discount"), col("supplier_id")), how = "left", on="product_id")\
.join(delivery_services_df.select("delivery_service_id","delivery_service_duration"), on="delivery_service_id", how="left")\
.join(supplier_df.select("supplier_id","supplied_quantity_for_month"), on="supplier_id", how="left")\
.drop_duplicates(["order_id","order_item_id"])

transformDate = udf(lambda z: reformat_date(z))

order_df = order_df.select("order_id","customer_id","order_approved_at","order_purchase_timestamp","order_delivered_carrier_date","order_delivered_customer_date","order_estimated_delivery_date","delivery_service_id")\
.withColumn("order_approved_at", transformDate("order_approved_at"))\
.withColumn("order_delivered_carrier_date", transformDate("order_delivered_carrier_date"))\
.withColumn("order_delivered_customer_date", transformDate("order_delivered_customer_date"))\
.withColumn("order_estimated_delivery_date", transformDate("order_estimated_delivery_date"))\
.withColumn("order_purchase_timestamp", transformDate("order_purchase_timestamp"))\
.join(order_payments_df.select("order_id","payment_sequential","payment_installments","payment_value"),on="order_id",how="left")\
.join(order_items_agg_df,on="order_id",how="left")\
.join(delivery_services_df.select("delivery_service_id","delivery_service_duration"),on="delivery_service_id",how="left")\
.drop_duplicates(["order_id"])
